CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 8, 1952, pg. 3, reads: "Apple Dealers Contribute - In connection with 'National Apple Week' celebrated the first week in November by apple dealers all over the nation, local produce dealers contributed many bushels of apples to Hill City Municipality here on Oct. 31, for the annual Halloween parade and celebration in Hill District. The apples were passed out to the youngsters at the programs held Halloween Night in the various Hill District schools.  Here a group of youngsters are shown with the apples. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of five girls and four boys posing with bushel baskets of apples on residential street, Hill District
